general.agentFrameworkDescription: The coding framework used for autonomous tasks
general.aiTerminalNamingDescription: Automatically name terminals based on commands (uses Haiku)
general.featureModelSettingsDescription: Model and thinking level for Insights, Ideation, and Roadmap
general.pythonPathDescription: Path to Python executable (leave empty for auto-detection)
general.gitPathDescription: Path to Git executable (leave empty for auto-detection)

theme.title: Appearance

ide.label: Preferred IDE

terminal.label: Preferred Terminal

devtools.noToolsDetected: No additional tools detected (VS Code and system terminal will be used)

autoNameClaude.label: Auto-name Claude terminals
autoNameClaude.description: Use AI to generate a descriptive name for Claude terminals based on your first message

yoloMode.label: YOLO Mode
yoloMode.description: Start Claude with --dangerously-skip-permissions flag, bypassing all safety prompts. Use with extreme caution.
yoloMode.warning: This mode bypasses Claude's permission system. Only enable if you fully trust the code being executed.

updates.title: Updates
updates.updateDownloaded: Update downloaded! Click Install to restart and apply the update.
updates.autoUpdateProjectsDescription: Automatically update Auto Claude in projects when a new version is available
updates.betaUpdatesDescription: Receive pre-release beta versions with new features (may be less stable)
updates.stableDowngradeDescription: You're currently on a beta version. Since you've disabled beta updates, you can switch to the latest stable release.

agentProfile.label: Agent Profile
agentProfile.title: Default Agent Profile
agentProfile.subtitle: Select a preset configuration for model and thinking level
agentProfile.sectionDescription: Select a preset configuration for model and thinking level
agentProfile.profilesInfo: Agent profiles provide preset configurations for Claude model and thinking level. When you create a new task, these settings will be used as defaults. You can always override them in the task creation wizard.
agentProfile.phaseConfigurationDescription: Customize model and thinking level for each phase
agentProfile.phaseConfigNote: These settings will be used as defaults when creating new tasks with this profile. You can override them per-task in the task creation wizard.
agentProfile.autoOptimizedDescription: Uses Opus across all phases with optimized thinking levels

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Manage Claude accounts and API keys
integrations.claudeAccountsDescription: Add multiple Claude subscriptions to automatically switch between them when you hit rate limits.
integrations.claudeAccountsWarning: When authenticating, ensure you're logged into the correct Claude account in your browser. Each profile should use a different subscription.
integrations.runSetupToken: Run claude and type /login to authenticate
integrations.autoSwitchingDescription: Automatically switch between Claude accounts to avoid interruptions. Configure proactive monitoring to switch before hitting limits.
integrations.masterSwitch: Master switch for all auto-swap features
integrations.proactiveDescription: Check usage regularly and swap before hitting limits
integrations.sessionThresholdDescription: Switch when session usage reaches this level (recommended: 95%)
integrations.weeklyThresholdDescription: Switch when weekly usage reaches this level (recommended: 99%)
integrations.reactiveDescription: Auto-swap when unexpected rate limit is hit
integrations.apiKeysInfo: Keys set here are used as defaults. Individual projects can override these in their settings.

toast.authSuccessGeneric: Authentication complete. You can now use this profile.
toast.profileCreatedAuthFailedDescription: Profile was added but authentication could not start. Click the login button to authenticate.
toast.tokenSavedDescription: Your token has been saved successfully.
toast.terminalCreationFailedDescription: Unable to start the authentication process. {{error}}
toast.maxTerminalsReachedDescription: Please close some terminals and try again. You can have up to 12 terminals open.
toast.authProcessFailedDescription: The authentication terminal could not be created. Please try again or check the logs for more details.

alerts.profileCreatedAuthFailed: Profile created but failed to prepare authentication: {{error}}
alerts.authStartFailedMessage: Failed to start authentication. Please try again.

autoSwitching.description: Automatically switch between accounts to avoid interruptions. Configure proactive monitoring to switch before hitting limits.

autoSwitching.weeklyThresholdDescription: Switch when weekly usage reaches this level (recommended: 99%)

priority.title: Account Priority Order
priority.description: Drag to reorder. System will switch to the next available account in order.
priority.noAccounts: No accounts configured. Add accounts above to set priority.
priority.duplicateUsageHint: This profile has identical usage to another profile, suggesting they may be authenticated to the same Anthropic account. Re-authenticate with a different account to fix.
priority.needsReauthHint: This profile's refresh token is invalid. Click to re-authenticate.
priority.tipDescription: Claude accounts are included in your subscription and will be cycled through first. API endpoints charge per request and are used as fallbacks when all Claude accounts hit their limits.

toast.tokenSavedDescription: Your token has been saved successfully.

alerts.profileCreatedAuthFailed: Profile created but failed to prepare authentication: {{error}}
alerts.authStartFailedMessage: Failed to start authentication. Please try again.

debug.description: Access logs and debug information for troubleshooting

errorReporting.label: Anonymous Error Reporting
errorReporting.description: Send crash reports to help improve Auto Claude. No personal data or code is collected.

debug.helpText: When reporting bugs, click "Copy Debug Info" to get system information and recent errors that help us diagnose the issue.

security.usingKeyFromApp: Using key from App Settings. Enter a project-specific key below to override.

security.enableMemoryDescriptionAlt: Persistent cross-session memory using embedded graph database
security.fileBasedMemory: Using file-based memory. Session insights are stored locally in JSON files. Enable Memory for persistent cross-session context with semantic search.

security.graphitiUrlDescription: URL of the Graphiti MCP server for agent memory access
security.graphitiUrlDescriptionAlt: URL of the Graphiti MCP server
security.embeddingProviderDescription: Provider for semantic search (optional - keyword search works without)
security.databaseNameDescriptionAlt: Name for the memory database (stored in ~/.auto-claude/memories/)
security.embeddingDimensionHint: Required for Ollama embeddings (e.g., 768 for nomic-embed-text)

hints.github: This looks like a GitHub MCP server. You'll need a Personal Access Token with appropriate scopes.
